Ru_trainchinese: pán: (графема) (книжн.) деревянный лоток, деревянная плошка (вариант 盘)
humanum_full_description_en:
From " wood " to " like " sound. The original essay " Fan " is like a toilet bowl standing sideways. After adding "攴" next to it, " fan " is mistaken for " boat ", written as " like ". Bronze inscriptions may be added next to the " pan " (indicating utensils) or " gold " (indicating being made of bronze). Wash plate Han Dynasty mostly wooden, and from it " wood " writing " nirvana ." "Said Wen": "Pan, Chengpan also. From the wood, the sound." Duan Yucai's note: "Chengpan, the water holder." Such as "Book of Rites. "Nei Ze": "Into the toilet, the younger ones will be served with the pan, the elders will be provided with water." Zheng Xuan's note: "Pan, the one who inherits the toilet." Jun Tao ":" Jun who also nirvana; the people who have water, water nirvana round and round. "See" where , "" like , "" disk . "

" Pan " is the same as "General", which means rotating and circling. Such as "Huainanzi. "Qi Su": "The ancients must not know the rituals of the multiplication and return." "Historical Records. "The Biography of Qu Yuan Jia Sheng": "The clouds are steaming and the rain is falling, and the mistakes are mixed; the junior college is full of things, and it is endless." Sima Zhensuo concealed: "Pan, you still turn."
humanum_short_description_en: From " wood " to " like " sound. The original essay " Fan " is like a toilet bowl standing sideways. After adding "攴" next to it, " fan " is mistaken for " boat ", written as " like ". Bronze inscriptions may be added next to the " pan " (indicating utensils) or " gold " (indicating being made of bronze). Wash plate Han Dynasty mostly wooden, and from it " wood " writing " nirvana ."
humanum_full_description:
從「木」，「般」聲。初文作「凡」，象側立的盥盤之形。後加「攴」旁，「凡」又訛為「舟」，寫作「般」。金文或增「皿」旁（表示器皿）或「金」旁（表示以青銅製作）。漢代的盥盤多以木製，故又從「木」寫作「槃」。《說文》：「槃，承槃也。从木，般聲。」段玉裁注：「承槃者，承水器也。」如《禮記．內則》：「進盥，少者奉槃，長者奉水。」鄭玄注：「槃，承盥水者。」《荀子．君道》：「君者，槃也；民者，水也，槃圓而水圓。」參見「凡」、「般」、「盤」。

　　「槃」用同「般」，表示旋轉、盤旋。如《淮南子．齊俗》：「古者，非不知繁升降槃還之禮也。」《史記．屈原賈生列傳》：「雲蒸雨降兮，錯繆相紛；大專槃物兮，坱軋無垠。」司馬貞索隱：「槃，猶轉也。」
humanum_short_description: 從「木」，「般」聲。初文作「凡」，象側立的盥盤之形。後加「攴」旁，「凡」又訛為「舟」，寫作「般」。金文或增「皿」旁（表示器皿）或「金」旁（表示以青銅製作）。漢代的盥盤多以木製，故又從「木」寫作「槃」。

Pictophonetic: 般 indicates the sound; 木 (wood) conveys the meaning.

從「 木 」，「 般 」聲。初文作「 凡 」，象側立的盥盤之形。後加「 攴 」旁，「 凡 」又訛為「 舟 」，寫作「 般 」。金文或增「 皿 」旁（表示器皿）或「 金 」旁（表示以青銅製作）。漢代的盥盤多以木製，故又從「 木 」寫作「 槃 」。《說文》：「槃，承槃也。从木，般聲。」段玉裁注：「承槃者，承水器也。」如《禮記．內則》：「進盥，少者奉槃，長者奉水。」鄭玄注：「槃，承盥水者。」《荀子．君道》：「君者，槃也；民者，水也，槃圓而水圓。」參見「 凡 」、「 般 」、「 盤 」。 「 槃 」用同「 般 」，表示旋轉、盤旋。如《淮南子．齊俗》：「古者，非不知繁升降槃還之禮也。」《史記．屈原賈生列傳》：「雲蒸雨降兮，錯繆相紛；大專槃物兮，坱軋無垠。」司馬貞索隱：「槃，猶轉也。」

Bronze inscriptions may be added next to the " pan" (indicating utensils) or " gold" (indicating being made of bronze). Wash plate Han Dynasty mostly wooden, and from it " wood" writing " nirvana." "Said Wen": "Pan, Chengpan also. From the wood, the sound." Duan Yucai's note: "Chengpan, the water holder." Such as "Book of Rites. "Nei Ze": "Into the toilet, the younger ones will be served with the pan, the elders will be provided with water." Zheng Xuan's note: "Pan, the one who inherits the toilet." 槃字的基本解释

槃
pán
同“盘”①③。
快乐：“昔文王不敢槃于游田，以万人惟忧。”
姓。

槃字的汉语字典释义

[①]［pán］
［《廣韻》薄官切，平桓，並。］
(1)同“盤”。木盘。古代承水器皿。
(2)同“盤”。谓形状如盘。
(3)同“盤”。旋转；盘绕。
(4)同“盤”。快乐。
(5)同“盤”。盘桓。参见“槃停”。
(6)同“盤”。量词。
(7)犁辕前可转动的部分。
(8)见“槃槃”。
(9)见“槃跚”。
(10)通“磐”。
(11)通“瘢”。参见“槃夷”。

槃字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　槃； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页545第20
【唐韻】薄官切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】蒲官切，?音盤。【說文】承盤也。或从金。或从皿。亦作柈。【禮·內則】適父母舅姑之所，少者奉槃，長者奉水，請沃盥。【周禮·天官·玉府】若合諸侯，則共珠槃玉敦。【註】古者以槃盛血，以敦盛食。　又槃樂也。【詩·衞風】考槃在澗。【鄭箋】考，成也。槃，樂也。　又槃停，不進也。【宋書·吳喜傳】西雉旣殄，便應還朝而解，故槃停，托云捍蜀。　又叶蒲沿切，便平聲。【魏·劉邵·趙都賦】牛首湡溟，波池潺湲。經落疇邑，詰曲縈槃。

考證：〔【周禮·天官·掌舍】若合諸侯，則共珠槃玉敦。【註】古者以槃盛皿。〕　謹照原文掌舍改玉府。皿改血。

槃字的起名意思

扁而浅的盛器；回绕，弯曲。

name.
Pan
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［pán］
["Guangyun" Boguan cut, Pinghuan, and. ]
(1) Same as "disk". Wooden plate. Ancient water container.
(2) Same as "disk". Said to be shaped like a disk.
(3) Same as "disk". Rotate; coiled.
(4) Same as "disk". happy.
(5) Same as "disk". linger. See "Panstop".
(6) Same as "disk". quantifier.
(7) The rotatable part of the plow shaft.
(8) See "Panpan".
(9) See "Panto".
(10) Through "pan".
(11) Through "scar". See "Pan Yi".
Pan
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　槃; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 545 No. 20
[Tang Yun] Bo Guan cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun] Pu Guan cut, sound plate. [Said the text] Undertaking also. Or from gold. Or from the dish. Also used as 柈. 【Ri·NeiZe】Suitable for parents and uncles, the young are served with pan, the elders are provided with water, please wow to wash. 【Zhou Li·Tian Guan·Jade Mansion】If you join the princes, you will have a total of pearls and jade dunes. [Note] The ancients used Pan to flourish blood and Dun Sheng to eat.　It's also Pakura. 【Poetry·Weifeng】The test is in Jian. [Zheng Jian] Test, success. Pan, Le Ye.　It stopped again, and didn't enter. [Song Shu·Wu Xi Biography] Xijiu was dying, so he should return to the court to solve it, so he stopped and asked the cloud to defend Shu.　The leaves are cut along, and the sound is flat. [Wei·Liu Shao·Zhao Du Fu] Niu Shou Huan Ming, Bo Chi Qiang. After Luo Chouyi, cross-examination Quyingpan. Textual research: [[Zhou Li·Tian Guan·Zhang She] If you are with the princes, you will have a total of pearls and jade dunes. [Note] The ancients used Pan Shengsan. 〕 　 I would like to change the Jade House according to the original text. Dishes change blood.
